Checkmarx Rule

QueryId : 393
Cwe : 0
IsExecutable : false
IsEncrypted : false
Severity : 0
PackageId : 24
Status : Original
Type : Regular

Source

 CxList methods = Find_Methods();
CxList regex = Find_Regex();

result = All.FindByMemberAccess("regex.Match") +
	All.FindByMemberAccess("regex.isMatch", false) +
	All.FindByMemberAccess("regex.Matches") +
	All.FindByMemberAccess("var.Match") +
	All.FindByMemberAccess("var.isMatch", false) +
	All.FindByMemberAccess("var.Matches");
